media:group.media:title: Bottle-to-Bottle Honey Production | Contactless Beekeeping
media:group.media:description:
This video is about my experience of breeding bees in plastic bottles and kegs. I am trying to find a way to promote the spread of non-commercial beekeeping on the planet Earth in an avalanche-like way. Humankind can live without honey but would starve without bees... -------------------------------- MY LOG CABIN CAMP development videos (All Seasons): 01 episode - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yeAG68azOBk (1 season) 2014 02 episode - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AaDvr5U3rm4 (1 season) 2014 03 episode - https://youtu.be/d2rk4cpaUwg (1 season) 2014 (not translated) 1 episode - https://youtu.be/z6HNfMBgnZ0 (2 season) 2015 2 episode - https://youtu.be/Cot3y87cvvk (2 season) 2015 3 episode -https://youtu.be/7DOCsMBA5lo (3 season) 2016 4 episode -https://youtu.be/fQSpQH9t_mM (3 season) 2016 5 episode - https://youtu.be/yjvRVLR5gLg (4 season) 2017 6 episode - https://youtu.be/arnAD8I7msQ (4 season) 2017 7 episode - https://youtu.be/xRSUxRUZb0I (5 season) 2018 8 episode - https://youtu.be/_RM5SD_FZ_0 (6 season) 2019 9 episode - https://youtu.be/q41ES-OXL_k (6 season) 2019 10 episode- https://youtu.be/YiHRYyBQyrw (6 season) 2019 -------------------------------- BUSHCRAFT playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w3MpFoIX5uw&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFiQV1vHlxK2brwIUXT73qMn -------------------------------- My DIY Projects playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vAGXOpWs-7o&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFgHaNIk0RMY3KGvBVKwJDaF -------------------------------- MY LOG CABIN playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z6HNfMBgnZ0&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFjmUs0uzmQIIdVbvD8-NYlk -------------------------------- COOKING IN THE WILD playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Ie6YnXsU8E&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFjXyJDsCj2Gv7IgkTa4a-hJ -------------------------------- My Patreon page: https://www.patreon.com/advoko

entry.title: DIY Tools, Outdoor Workshop, Log Cabin Remodel / Season 6 episode 10

media:group.media:title: DIY Tools, Outdoor Workshop, Log Cabin Remodel / Season 6 episode 10
media:group.media:description:
In the previous episodes, I've shown my on-site preparations which were necessary for beginning the main summer project of making a wooden waterwheel and a waterwheel-powered mill. I have already made a topsy-turvy workbench, fixed the cabin's door broken by an intruder, made a new wooden mallet, as well as installed and tested a DIY cloggers knife. Everything is going according to my plans and I will soon be able to start building the waterwheel but first, it is important to prepare all of the necessary tools and organize a comfortable workspace. -------------------------------- Two Chainsaw Secrets | Turning a Tree into Perfect Boards: https://youtu.be/8qz64ELkxdA -------------------------------- MY LOG CABIN CAMP development videos (All Seasons): 01 episode - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yeAG68azOBk (1 season) 2014 02 episode - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AaDvr5U3rm4 (1 season) 2014 03 episode - https://youtu.be/d2rk4cpaUwg (1 season) 2014 (not translated) 1 episode - https://youtu.be/z6HNfMBgnZ0 (2 season) 2015 2 episode - https://youtu.be/Cot3y87cvvk (2 season) 2015 3 episode -https://youtu.be/7DOCsMBA5lo (3 season) 2016 4 episode -https://youtu.be/fQSpQH9t_mM (3 season) 2016 5 episode - https://youtu.be/yjvRVLR5gLg (4 season) 2017 6 episode - https://youtu.be/arnAD8I7msQ (4 season) 2017 7 episode - https://youtu.be/xRSUxRUZb0I (5 season) 2018 8 episode - https://youtu.be/_RM5SD_FZ_0 (6 season) 2019 9 episode - https://youtu.be/q41ES-OXL_k (6 season) 2019 10 episode- https://youtu.be/YiHRYyBQyrw (6 season) 2019 -------------------------------- My Patreon page: https://www.patreon.com/advoko
#logcabin #bushcraft #survival #diy

entry.title: Top 5 Bushcraft Projects at My Log Cabin Camp | Overview of a 30 Day Summer Expedition

media:group.media:title: Top 5 Bushcraft Projects at My Log Cabin Camp | Overview of a 30 Day Summer Expedition
media:group.media:description:
This video is an overview of my accomplished projects and bushcraft activities during the last summer vacation spent at my log cabin camp. During that month: I improved the creek's dam, assembled a water wheel-powered mill, made a bushcraft tool rack, fastened and tested a DIY clogger's knife, repaired the cabin's door that was broken by an intruder, established a small garden, as well as milled flour and coffee for more bushcraft culinary experiments. -------------------------------- MY LOG CABIN playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z6HNfMBgnZ0&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFjmUs0uzmQIIdVbvD8-NYlk -------------------------------- BUSHCRAFT playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w3MpFoIX5uw&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFiQV1vHlxK2brwIUXT73qMn -------------------------------- My DIY Projects playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vAGXOpWs-7o&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFgHaNIk0RMY3KGvBVKwJDaF -------------------------------- COOKING IN THE WILD playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Ie6YnXsU8E&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFjXyJDsCj2Gv7IgkTa4a-hJ -------------------------------- Friends, for your convenience I assembled a chronologically arranged list of videos about my efforts in establishing this log cabin camp in the off-grid remote location of Karelia (All Seasons): ------------------------------- 01 episode - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yeAG68azOBk​​ (1 season) 2014 02 episode - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AaDvr5U3rm4​​ (1 season) 2014 03 episode - ​https://youtu.be/d2rk4cpaUwg​ (1 season) 2014 (not translated)
1 episode - ​​https://youtu.be/z6HNfMBgnZ0​​ (2 season) 2015

entry.title: Making a Tick Extractor from a Credit Card

media:group.media:title: Making a Tick Extractor from a Credit Card
media:group.media:description:
Showing how to effectively remove a tick in a survival situation using just a knife and credit card. -------------------------------- MY LOG CABIN playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z6HNfMBgnZ0&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFjmUs0uzmQIIdVbvD8-NYlk -------------------------------- BUSHCRAFT playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w3MpFoIX5uw&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFiQV1vHlxK2brwIUXT73qMn -------------------------------- My DIY Projects playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vAGXOpWs-7o&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFgHaNIk0RMY3KGvBVKwJDaF -------------------------------- COOKING IN THE WILD playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Ie6YnXsU8E&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFjXyJDsCj2Gv7IgkTa4a-hJ -------------------------------- Friends, for your convenience I assembled a chronologically arranged list of videos about my efforts in establishing this log cabin camp in the off-grid remote location of Karelia (All Seasons): ------------------------------- 01 episode - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yeAG68azOBk​​ (1 season) 2014 02 episode - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AaDvr5U3rm4​​ (1 season) 2014 03 episode - ​https://youtu.be/d2rk4cpaUwg​ (1 season) 2014 (not translated)

entry.title: Making a Huge Two-handed Chisel from Scraps

media:group.media:title: Making a Huge Two-handed Chisel from Scraps
media:group.media:description:
Forging an extra-large chisel from a leaf spring and metal pipe. Such two-handed DIY chisel is ideal to work on hard-to-reach spots where you can't get with your axe, spokeshave or hand plane. -------------------------------- Heating a Tent with a Log Torch: https://youtu.be/QeHGDr81XwM -------------------------------- MY LOG CABIN playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z6HNfMBgnZ0&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFjmUs0uzmQIIdVbvD8-NYlk -------------------------------- BUSHCRAFT playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w3MpFoIX5uw&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFiQV1vHlxK2brwIUXT73qMn -------------------------------- My DIY Projects playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vAGXOpWs-7o&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFgHaNIk0RMY3KGvBVKwJDaF -------------------------------- COOKING IN THE WILD playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6Ie6YnXsU8E&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFjXyJDsCj2Gv7IgkTa4a-hJ -------------------------------- Friends, for your convenience I assembled a chronologically arranged list of videos about my efforts in establishing this log cabin camp in the off-grid remote location of Karelia (All Seasons): ------------------------------- 01 episode - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yeAG68azOBk​​ (1 season) 2014 02 episode - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AaDvr5U3rm4​​ (1 season) 2014 03 episode - ​https://youtu.be/d2rk4cpaUwg​ (1 season) 2014 (not translated)

entry.title: 21 Days Alone in the Northern Wilderness

media:group.media:title: 21 Days Alone in the Northern Wilderness
media:group.media:description:
These are bushcraft projects completed at my off-grid log cabin camp that I am building in a remote location away from roads and people. -------------------------------- Forging a Bi-metal Bearded Axe from a RR Tie Plate and File: https://youtu.be/vAGXOpWs-7o -------------------------------- My Log Cabin playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z6HNfMBgnZ0&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFjmUs0uzmQIIdVbvD8-NYlk -------------------------------- Bushcraft playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w3MpFoIX5uw&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFiQV1vHlxK2brwIUXT73qMn -------------------------------- My DIY Projects playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vAGXOpWs-7o&list=PLLLrkJ7BrZFgHaNIk0RMY3KGvBVKwJDaF -------------------------------- Friends, for your convenience I assembled a chronologically arranged list of videos about my efforts in establishing this log cabin camp in the off-grid remote location of Karelia (All Seasons): ------------------------------- 01 episode - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yeAG68azOBk​​ (1 season) 2014 02 episode - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AaDvr5U3rm4​​ (1 season) 2014 03 episode - ​https://youtu.be/d2rk4cpaUwg​ (1 season) 2014 (not translated)
